Source code for straph.wrack.dijkstra_stream

from straph import stream as sg



[docs]def distance_between_nodes(I,current_time):
    """
    :param I: Intervalle contact
    :return: distance
    """
    d=float('Inf')
    for i,j in zip(I[::2],I[1::2]):
        if current_time > j:
            continue
        if current_time>= i and current_time <=j:
            d=0
            return d
        if current_time < i :
            d= i-current_time
            return  d
    return d



[docs]def dijkstra_path(S,b,e):
    visited=[]                                  # Les noeuds visités
    unvisited=S.nodes                           # Les noeuds non visités
    d={n : float('Inf') for n in unvisited}     # Initialisation des distances pour atteeiindre les noeuds
    d[b]=0                                      # Distance pour atteindre la source = 0 (duh)
    N=S.neighborhood()                          # On récupére les voisins, c'est gourmand mais on parcourt tout
                                                # quoiqu'il arrive
    current_node=b                              # On démarre du noeud source
    current_time = S.node_presence[S.nodes.index(b)][0]  #Premier temps de présence du noeud
    path=[(current_node,current_time)]                                     # La liste du chemin à parcourir [(noeud,temps)]
    previous_node=None
    previous_time=None
    while unvisited:
        current_neighborhood=N[current_node]
        print("current_time :",current_time,"current_node :",current_node)
        print("Current_neighborhood :",current_neighborhood)
        tentative_distance={n: distance_between_nodes(current_neighborhood[n],current_time)
                       for n in current_neighborhood if n in unvisited}
        if tentative_distance:
            min_tentative_dist=min(tentative_distance.values())
            for n in tentative_distance:
                if d[n] > d[current_node]+tentative_distance[n]:
                    d[n]=d[current_node]+tentative_distance[n]
                    if n==e:
                        path.append((e,current_time+d[n]-d[current_node]))
                if tentative_distance[n]==min_tentative_dist:
                    next_node=n
                    # Virer le chemin précédent si il est inutile :
                    # cad : d[n] > d[current_node]+tentative_distance[n]
                    #       d[n] > d[previous_node]+tentative_distance[n] ??
                    #       tentative_distance[previous_node] > tentative_distance[n] ?
        print("list_distance :",d)
        print("path :",path)
        try:
            unvisited.remove(current_node)    # Delete the current_node from the unvisited list
        except:
            print("Failure to find a path but distance calculated :",d[e])
            return d[e],path
        visited.append(current_node)      # Append the current_node to the visited list
        current_time += d[next_node]-d[current_node]    # Update Time
        current_node = next_node                        # Update node
        path.append((next_node, current_time))
        if current_node==e:                             # If the destination is now in visited done !
            return d[e],path
    print("cannot find path")
    return None


if __name__ == '__main__':
    S=sg.read_from_file("/home/leo/Dev/stream_graph_ex.pck")
    distance,path=dijkstra_path(S,'C','A')
    print("distance DIJKSTRA :",distance)
    print("Chemin DIJKSTRA :",path)
